How can I verify the safety of the Verus software?

You can verify the safety of the Verus software by checking the virus scan results on VirusTotal, a reputable online virus scanning service. The links to the scan results for different platforms (MacOS, Linux-x86-64, Linux-ARM64, and Windows) are provided. Additionally, you can review resources from Malwarebytes and Kaspersky to learn more about false positives and PUP warnings.

These are warnings that you are installing mining software, which may be installed by a third party to exploit your PC.
